conbody.p: MapR FS File Metadata executorcreating empty filesYou can configure the MapR FS File Metadata executor to create empty files in MapR FS upon receiving an event. You might create empty files to trigger downstream actions in other applications, such as Oozie.
To create an empty file, specify an expression for the File Path property that provides an absolute path to the location where you want the file created.

When creating an empty file, you can also specify the following file details:
File owner and group
File permissions
Access control lists (ACLs)
